mapper.insert: insert into document_versions (document_version_id, company_id, document_id, version_no, file_url, file_name, file_type, file_size_bytes, uploaded_by, uploaded_at) values (#{documentVersionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSizeBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uploadedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update document_versions set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_id = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_no = #{versionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size_bytes = #{fileSizeBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uploaded_by = #{uploadedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploaded_at = #{uploadedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where document_version_id = #{documentVersionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select document_version_id, company_id, document_id, version_no, file_url, file_name, file_type, file_size_bytes, uploaded_by, uploaded_at from document_versions where document_version_id = #{documentVersionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select document_version_id, company_id, document_id, version_no, file_url, file_name, file_type, file_size_bytes, uploaded_by, uploaded_at from document_versions
